articles.description: Police in Plant City, Fla., have issued a nationwide person of interest alert after a car contain...
articles.content:
Police in Plant City, Fla., have issued a nationwide person of interest alert after a car containing vials of the COVID-19 vaccine was stolen Wednesday.
About 30 vials were stolen during the robbery… [+1168 chars]
